alert.note: Alert for Rabun (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 27 at 3:53PM EDT until May 27 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... A Dam Floodgate Release in... South Central Rabun County in northeastern Georgia... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 353 PM EDT, dam operators report floodgates opening leading to a high flow event at Mathis Dam. Parts of Shady Lane and Mathis Dam Road will flood and Joy Road Bridge will likely be closed. HAZARD...Flash flooding from a dam floodgate release. SOURCE...Dam operator. IMPACT...Flooding of areas along the river immediately downstream of the dam. * Some locations that may experience flash flooding include... Tallulah Falls, Lakemont, Lake Rabun and Tallulah Gorge State Park. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: If you are in low lying areas below the Mathis Dam you should move to higher ground immediately. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
